overview: Falcon Legend top man Mike Branâ€™s nine best scenes are finally available on one DVD. Over two full hours of Mike Bran! This anthology includes the following scenes:  Hardline: Mike Bran and Brent Sawyer;  Manhandlers: Mike Bran and Tony Manchester;  The Freshmen: Tom Chase, Mike Bran, Tony Idol, and Chris Berrara;  High Tide: Mike Bran, Matthew Anders, Brian Cruise, and Sebastian Cruz;  Current Affairs: Mike Bran and Kyle Becker;  Basic Plumbing 2: Mike Bran and Christopher Scott  Hot Wired: Mike Bran, Brennan Foster & Jake Andrews;  The Chosen: Christopher Scott, Derek Cameron, Paul Morgan, Damon Wolf, Jeff Palmer, Mike  Bran, Travis Wade, Buck Meadows, Brian Cruise, and Michael Lucas;  California Kings: Mike Bran and Tom Chase
tagline: See what makes superstar Mike Branson a true Falcon Legend! Nine scorching hot, full-length scenes from some of Falcon's greatest titles of all time make this collection a must own.
title: The Best of Mike Branson
